translations: n.受害者，罹难者；（面对不幸事件或虐待时的）无助者，患病者；牺牲品，祭品；受骗者

phrs.translation: 成为…的牺牲品；成为…的受害者；屈服于…；被…降服

sentences.sentence: He was the victim of calumny.
The victim has not yet been named.
sentences.translation: 受害人的姓名仍未得知。

sentences.sentence: He was a victim of racial prejudice.
sentences.translation: 他是种族偏见的一个牺牲品。
